data.introduce: 根据PNR选择航段，对应主机SEL指令。
data.business: 选择PNR的某航段，对应主机SEL指令。
data.functions:
1. 支持范围：国内PNR、国际PNR
2. 支持操作：
   选择航段：会在航段后面加上TKT、QTE或者T_Q标识
3. 影响范围：运价计算、运价存储、出票
   TKT：会在航段后加入“TKT”标识，用于输入运价和出票（国际）；计算运价、输入运价和出票（国内）；
   QTE：会在航段后加入“QTE”标识，用于计算国际运价（但是对国际运价的输入、国际航段出票、以及国内运价计算、输入、出票都没有影响）；
   T_Q：是TKT和QTE的结合，会在航段后加入“T&Q”标识，用于计算国际运价、国际运价输入、国际航段出票；
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirSegSelRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"一种取值：SELECT，表示选择航段","children":[]},{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"类型。PNR","children":[]}]},{"name":"SegmentSelectDetail","type":"object","quantity":"1..16","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Option","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"操作。Type为select时必填，只能填如下值：TKT:影响国内运价计算、运价输入和出票；QTE:影响国际运价计算；T_Q:影响国际运价计算、运价输入和出票","children":[]},{"name":"SegmentRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR行序号","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirSegSelRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息（英文）","children":[]}]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<TES_AirSegSelRQ Type="SELECT">
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187" />
	</POS>
	<BookingReferenceID ID="HQRHX7" ID_Context="PNR" />
	<SegmentSelectDetail SegmentRPH="2" Option="TKT" />
	<SegmentSelectDetail SegmentRPH="3" Option="TKT" />		
</TES_AirSegSelRQ>
